libs.djex.autodocs package¶

Submodules¶

libs.djex.autodocs.models module¶

libs.djex.autodocs.urls module¶

libs.djex.autodocs.utils module¶

Misc. utility functions/classes for admin documentation generator.

libs.djex.autodocs.utils.create_reference_role(rolename, urlbase)¶
libs.djex.autodocs.utils.default_reference_role(name, rawtext, text, lineno, inliner, options=None, content=None)¶
libs.djex.autodocs.utils.parse_docstring(docstring)¶

Parse out the parts of a docstring. Returns (title, body, metadata).

libs.djex.autodocs.utils.parse_rst(text, default_reference_context, thing_being_parsed=None)¶

Convert the string from reST to an XHTML fragment.

libs.djex.autodocs.utils.trim_docstring(docstring)¶

Uniformly trims leading/trailing whitespace from docstrings.

Based on http://www.python.org/peps/pep-0257.html#handling-docstring-indentation

libs.djex.autodocs.views module¶

class libs.djex.autodocs.views.GenericSite¶

Bases: object

domain = 'example.com'¶
name = 'my site'¶
libs.djex.autodocs.views.bookmarklets(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
libs.djex.autodocs.views.doc_index(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
libs.djex.autodocs.views.extract_views_from_urlpatterns(urlpatterns, base='')¶

Return a list of views from a list of urlpatterns.

Each object in the returned list is a two-tuple: (view_func, regex)

libs.djex.autodocs.views.get_readable_field_data_type(field)¶

Returns the description for a given field type, if it exists, Fields’ descriptions can contain format strings, which will be interpolated against the values of field.__dict__ before being output.

libs.djex.autodocs.views.get_return_data_type(func_name)¶

Return a somewhat-helpful data type given a function name

libs.djex.autodocs.views.import_module_without_decorators(mod, func)¶

TODO 由于载入在装饰器将导致func中无法识别内部元素（找不到Form），因此注释了装饰器才载入方法 如有办法能在带有django装饰器的情况下依然准确获取func内容，可以删除这个丑陋的方法。

libs.djex.autodocs.views.load_all_installed_template_libraries()¶
libs.djex.autodocs.views.missing_docutils_page(request)¶

Display an error message for people without docutils

libs.djex.autodocs.views.model_detail(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
libs.djex.autodocs.views.model_index(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
libs.djex.autodocs.views.simplify_regex(pattern)¶

Clean up urlpattern regexes into something somewhat readable by Mere Humans: turns something like “^(?P<sport_slug>w+)/athletes/(?P<athlete_slug>w+)/$” into “<sport_slug>/athletes/<athlete_slug>/”

libs.djex.autodocs.views.view_index(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Module contents¶

自动提取注释生成文档，基于django admindocs 对以form接收参数的views方法，可进一步生成前后端交互参数文档 由于目前基本不是使用form写的views方法，暂时不启用
